Sections.Name: Modules
Sections.Description: Enable or disable the optional modules contained in this mod

Keys.Name: equipmentDamageEnhanced
Keys.Description: Equipment condition damage is increased significantly, the amount of wear your equipment takes is based on many different factors; Material, Damage Source, Etc

Keys.Name: fixedStrengthDamageModifier
Keys.Description: Fixes a bug in DFU 0.10.21, the strength modifier for damage is double what classic had. This module fixes that, so 10 points = +1, instead of 10 points = +2

Keys.Name: armorHitFormulaRedone
Keys.Description: Armor no longer increases your chance to avoid damage, but instead reduces the damage that you do take in physical combat. The readme and mod-page provided goes into great detail if desired

Keys.Name: criticalStrikesIncreaseDamage
Keys.Description: Critical Strikes Increase Damage, not just hit-chance. !!!! This Module Is Dependent On Armor Hit Formula Redone
